item.title: Best Drugstore Lipsticks
item.description: Shopping the drugstore is not only convenient, but its budget friendly. Especially in this day and age; drugstore makeup brands have been keeping up with makeup trends and really developing products with quality comparable to Sephora brands, and itâ€™s all at our fingertips. Are you ready to make yourself over with a new affordable lip? Here are some of my favorite lipsticks the drugstore has to offer that are the best bang for your buck (yeah and some of these are almost one buck!
